[et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”off” specialty=”off” next_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.0.106″ background_color=”#00008b”][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.106″ background_layout=”light”]

Accept Credit Cards Online

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ prev_background_color=”#00008b”][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=”3_4″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.106″ background_layout=”light”]

Accepting Credit Cards Online Has Never Been Easier!

If you sell products or services online, accepting credit and debit cards and a must! With DigTech Services, we give you all of the tools and resources available in order to successfully accept credit and debit cards right on your website. Not only does this help you increase revenue, but it also gives your customers the best experience possible. Our Internet merchant services include a payment gateway and an Internet merchant account. Let our systems do the work so you can focus on running your business!

What’s Included?
● Account set up, which allows you to start accepting Visa, Mastercard, Discover, American Express, including debit cards.
● Set up of Authorize.net, which processes the transaction information from your website over a securely encrypted SSL (secure socket layer) connection. This means that your customer’s information is safe and secure, giving both you and them peace of mind.
● Process and review all of your transactions online using our intuitive virtual terminal.

Compatible with Most Shopping Cart Platforms!
Our services are compatible with most shopping cart platforms available today. Not sure? Just give us a call and we can help you determine your business needs and which of our services will best meet them. With DigTech Services, you are providing the best online shopping experience for your customers, while also providing yourself with the tools necessary to run a successful online business.
Don’t delay, we will have your credit card processing system up and running in no time!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
